The silver suit has sleek circuit pattern details and embedded LED lights that glow along the chest and arms. The figure is holding two pink LED glowsticks. The scene is in deep outer space with a dark starry sky and colorful nebulae. Rainbow lasers and UV lights reflect brilliantly on the smooth silver surfaces

The sloth is wearing chunky kandi bead necklaces and holding two pink LED glowsticks. A pastel pink plush backpack shaped like a speaker is on its back. The scene is in deep outer space with a dark black sky full of stars and colorful nebulae. Rainbow lasers and UV lights shine on the costume
